SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.TUI

Class HandView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.TUI.HandView
public class HandView extends Object
This class represents the hand view in the game. It handles the display of the hand cards and the personal objective card.

    • updateHandView

      public void updateHandView(List<String> hand)
      Updates the hand view with the given hand cards. Waits for the HandView to be started before updating.
      Parameters:
      hand - the list of hand cards

    • flipHandCard

      public void flipHandCard(int cardId)
      Flips the hand card with the given card ID.
      Parameters:
      cardId - the ID of the card to be flipped

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard(int cardId, int[] position)
      Plays the card with the given card ID at the given position.
      Parameters:
      cardId - the ID of the card to be played
      position - the position to play the card at
      Returns:
      true if the card was played successfully, false otherwise

      public boolean drawCardFromMarket(int cardIndex)
      Draws a card from the market with the given card index.
      Parameters:
      cardIndex - the index of the card to be drawn
      Returns:
      true if the card was drawn successfully, false otherwise
